long_description: Effortless to mount and sleek in design, the low-profile Yakima WB300 Rooftop Ski/Snowboard mount holds 6 pairs of your fattest skis or 4 snowboards. Big push-button opening makes it simple to operate even with gloves on. Integrated binding lift gives you optimal clearance between car roof and bindings. Low-profile design with aerodynamic nesting arms slices through the wind to help cut down on gas usage. Internal hinge system allows mount remain low and compact while carrying fat skis and boards. Easy, tool-free installation means you're on your way to the slopes in no time. Industry standard "T Bolt" and universal clamps ensure a perfect fit to Whispbar racks and many other aero racks. Lockable with included SKS lock cores and keys. Yakima WB300 Rooftop Ski/Snowboard mount mounts cannot be removed from crossbars when closed and locked.
short_description: Effortless to mount and sleek in design, the low-profile Yakima WB300 Rooftop Ski/Snowboard mount holds 6 pairs of your fattest skis or 4 snowboards.
